originalText.text: Dr Mitchell and his staff are excellent! I have been a patient for many years , too many to count . The staff has always been extremely helpful . Dr Mitchell was able to get me past , prior to seeing him, many seasons of allergies colds and asthma . With his help and advice I no longer stress about colds and allergies because I know I am in good hands .

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Dean Mitchell for over a year now for pain management, and treatment. He has been incredibly kind and knowledgeable from the start, he takes time to listen and has gone above and beyond in regards to my health. The excellent care I have received at Mitchell Medical Care Group has helped to reduce and improve symptoms of pain I have struggled with for years, and the warm presence of the staff constantly make me feel welcome in the office.

originalText.text:
I can't overstate it: Dr. Dean Mitchell changed my life! I suffered for years with itchy skin rashes and painful blotches on my face, and no allergist or dermatologist took the time to ask questions and run tests like Dr. Dean did on my first visit. I tested positive for Candida, and my skin cleared within two weeks of treatment. It's a miracle!!! I'm about five months into my Candida treatment and my skin looks and feels better than it has ever been. Everyone who works in his office is lovely and pleasant to deal with. I have recommended Dr. Mitchell to friends and would recommend his care to anyone!! His wonderful, caring practice has restored my faith in the medical community. Thank you, Dr. Dean!!

Sincerely,
Jill Shomer

originalText.text: I have been using Mitchell Medical for 7 years as my doctors.  They are very through, and the work with you to solve your issues.  I see many patients returning to them  time after time. So much so that we (the patients) often have long running conversations about our lives.  I had Candida and they pretty much cured me.  I now only go for follow ups. But when I was really sick they followed my progress constantly.  They adjusted the treatments several times to solve my specific case.  Although it took a long time to get better, they stayed with me all the way. I highly recommend them, and have sent several to my friends to them.

originalText.text: I came in experiencing excruciating pain. I had been feeling awful for about 2 weeks with a flare up of my fibromyalgia. I felt heard and understood when speaking with dr. Mitchell and although I wanted a quick fix to simply feel better, she is ensuring that we work to figure out the why behind the pain and think about how to treat me now and prevent future flare ups. I feel confident that I have found a doctor who will get me back to living a mostly pain free life.
